author: daxian-dbw
body: The nuget package `Microsoft.PowerShell.Commands.Management` depends on `Microsoft.WSMan.Management` for the `net451` target framework, and `Microsoft.WSMan.Management` depends on `Microsoft.WSMan.Runtime`. So we need to publish nuget packages for `Microsoft.WSMan.Management` and `Microsoft.WSMan.Runtime` to powershell-core feed.
title: Need to publish nuget packages for Microsoft.WSMan.Management and Microsoft.WSMan.Runtime to powershell-core feed
